oneDayAthlete.title: Register as One-Day Athlete
oneDayAthlete.info: If you don't have a Belgian athletics license, you can register as a one-day athlete using one of the options below.

foreing.label: Foreign Athlete
foreing.title: Register Foreign Athlete
foreing.description: For non-Belgian athletes with a license in their country

bpm.label: BPM Athlete
bpm.title: Register BPM Athlete
bpm.description: For young athletes in BEN, PUP, or MIN categories

all.label: One-Day Athlete
all.title: Register One-Day Athlete
all.description: For any participant without a regular license

oneDayAthlete.countryNotListed: If your country is not listed, please contact us
oneDayAthlete.error: Failed to create one-day athlete. Please try again.

acceptTerms: I accept the use of my personal data in the context of this competition
athleteAlreadyInscribedNotByYou: This athlete is already registered for this competition by another user. In case of doubt, please contact the organizer.

success.title: Your registration has been successfully saved
success.message: An email has been sent to you with the details of your inscription.

pending.title: Your registration is being processed
pending.message: An email will be sent to you as soon as your registration is validated.

needToBeConnected: You need to be connected to register for a competition
needToBeVerified: You need to verify your account to register for a competition
noEvent: This competition has no event yet
clubNotAllowed: Your club is not allowed to register for this competition
maxEventByAthlete: You can register for maximum {{count}} event
maxEventsByAthlete: You can register for maximum {{count}} events
